input_text:
Job Title: Project Manager (IT)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Project Manager
The Project Manager is a full-time member of the Envision IT Professional Services Organization focused on planning, executing, monitoring, and closing projects according to the agreed scope, budget, and timeline. Project Managers act as the primary point of contact for client-facing projects and are critical to ensuring Envision meets client objectives for projects. They coordinate and communicate with internal and external stakeholders, including clients, partners, and senior management, and manage project risks, issues, and changes, escalating them when necessary. Project Managers help ensure quality standards and client satisfaction are met throughout the project lifecycle and make Envision’s work visible to all stakeholders. As a key member of the overall Envision Family, Project Managers are passionate about Making. Awesome. Work!
Qualification and Skill Requirements:Growth mindsetExcellent written and verbal communication skillsAppreciation of a conscious cultureIntrinsically motivatedExperience managing multiple IT related projects of differing types, teams, and complexities in a fast-paced environmentDemonstrated ability to plan, execute, monitor, and close projects according to the agreed scope, budget, and timelineDemonstrated ability to effectively coordinate and communicate with internal and external stakeholders, including clients, vendors, and senior managementDemonstrated ability to effectively manage and mitigate project risks, issues, and changes, and escalate to leadership, as necessaryEnsure quality standards and customer satisfaction are met throughout the project lifecyclePrepare and maintain project documentation, reports, and deliverablesEffective time management skillsExperience with project management systemsCertification in SCRUM or PMP is preferred
Position Highlights:Work with consulting engineers, clients, and other project managers on technology projectsTroubleshoot and resolve client incidentsCollaborate with other Envision teams on client projectsPrioritize tasks, seek collaboration and assistance when neededContinuous team and self-improvement through training, mentoring, and sharingCollaborate with cross-functional project team members to ensure client satisfaction and timely resolution of issuesDevelop and maintain documentation related to client IT systems and infrastructureStay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to provide the best solutions to clients
Benefits:Health (Quartz), Dental, and VisionFlexible Spending and Dependent CareShort- and Long-Term DisabilityLife Insurance401kRemote WorkPet InsuranceWork life balance – flexible schedule and flexible PTO

Envision IT is a soulful company comprised of caring people with a growth mindset. Envisioners are passionate about our purpose: enriching the lives of our stakeholders. Our focus is technology optimization that empowers people to meaningfully contribute, enables employee engagement and supports businesses and employees to thrive. Envision IT is searching for intrinsically motivated, curious and compassionate people to join our team.

Experience Level (if available): None

required_skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Coordinate and communicate with internal and external stakeholders

Collaborate with cross-functional project team members
Ensure client satisfaction and timely resolution of issues
